name: Light Fantastik (itch)
description:
Light Fantastik is on Steam now! Go grab your copy with more levels, a level editor and much better visuals: https://store.steampowered.com/app/690630/Light_Fantastik/

Use arrows/enter to use menu
Use arrows to move
Press R to restart level
Press M to mute

A puzzle platformer set in a maze and it's reflection, which one can be seen and other can be climbed. Decide your way up in Light side and climb it at inverted side!

If you like it, please consider to share!
Last Updated: 29-05-2014

Made with Construct 2
Works best in Chrome / Chromium
GGJ 2014 entry
